Sentencas: The performance of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) was significantly enhanced through surface modification of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte by doped ceria interlayers.
Titulo: Improving solid oxide fuel cells with yttria-doped ceria interlayers by atomic layer deposition

Sentencas: Ultra-thin yttria-doped-ceria (YDC) layers were fabricated by atomic layer deposition (ALD).
Titulo: Improving solid oxide fuel cells with yttria-doped ceria interlayers by atomic layer deposition

Sentencas: The doping concentrations of Y2O3 were finely tuned by changing the Ce : Y pulsing ratios.
Titulo: Improving solid oxide fuel cells with yttria-doped ceria interlayers by atomic layer deposition

Sentencas: YDC layers were inserted between bulk YSZ electrolyte and a porous Pt cathode.
Titulo: Improving solid oxide fuel cells with yttria-doped ceria interlayers by atomic layer deposition

Sentencas: The performance of SOFCs with different doping concentrations of YDC interlayers was measured using the linear sweep voltammetry method at operating temperatures between 300 and 500 degrees C.
Titulo: Improving solid oxide fuel cells with yttria-doped ceria interlayers by atomic layer deposition

Sentencas: The fuel cell performance was enhanced by a factor of 2-3.6 within the Y2O3 doping range of 12-17 M%.
Titulo: Improving solid oxide fuel cells with yttria-doped ceria interlayers by atomic layer deposition

Sentencas: The enhanced performance was attributed to an increased oxide ion incorporation rate at the electrode/electrolyte interface.
Titulo: Improving solid oxide fuel cells with yttria-doped ceria interlayers by atomic layer deposition
